question: Determine the length of Line_B_F0 in the figure.
qt_description: Line Line_B_F0 (New: True, Expr Length: 11) (Desc: Draw perpendicular from point B to line L2 (foot F0 on segment))
description:
原始图形描述: Base shape is a regular 3-sided polygon (center O1) with side length 9, rotation angle pi/3 radians. Total 2 derivation rounds. Round 1: applying 'circum_inscribe' rule. Circumscribed circle (center O1) around 3-sided polygon. Round 2: applying 'translation' rule. Translation derivation: circle (new center O2) translated right. Found 6 total points (including intersections). Geometry finalized: 0 new lines and 8 new arcs generated by splitting. Total lines: 3, total arcs: 10, total points: 6.

generated_question: In the given figure, a regular triangle with side length 9 is centered at O1. A circle is circumscribed about this triangle, and a second circle, centered at O2, is obtained by translating the first circle to the right. Points A, B, and C lie on the circles, with A and C being intersection points of the two circles, and B being a vertex of the original triangle. Line L2 is the line segment joining the centers O1 and O2. A perpendicular is drawn from point B to line L2, meeting it at foot F0, which lies on segment O1O2. Determine the length of segment BF0.
